availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Anderson (McCracken County, Kentucky, clerk and justice of the peace)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, clerk and justice of the peace. Alabama native. Married to Sarah Anderson. Father of Cyna Anderson, James Anderson, Martin V. B. Anderson, and Emiline Anderson. Clerk in McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in McCracken County in 1860. Justice of the peace in McCracken County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah and Suburbs, p. 151A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 959.
KYR-0001-031-0031.
